item.description:
下午6点到晚上8点

We will talk in English and Mandarin.

If you would like to share in English and Mandarin (as a speaker on an American topic - or a Chinese topic interesting to Americans) from 7:00 to 7:20 pm, e-mail in advance.  We are scheduling bilingual speakers to show off their talents to advanced through beginning Mandarin speakers.

6:00 - 7:00 pm - informal chat and getting to know others

7:00 - 7:30 pm - bilingual "guest" speaker

7:30 - 8:00 pm - question and answer - bilingual English and Mandarin

Mandarin speakers need to register IN ADVANCE to get the location at HSPH and to get permission.

E-Mail LMA_Mandarin@YMail.com and Maynard.Clark@GMail.com (with first and last name as they appear on the ID you present to the HSPH security guard) to register your intent - AND also sign YES on this meetup.

下午6点到晚上8点3

If you don't HAVE a Harvard ID, we need your request for admission on Tuesday evening to be COMPLETED by 4 pm the day before the event. NOT registering in advance will leave out at the building security guard's desk. IF you bring guests, their names are also required so that they can also get building passes.
